languages.text: Арлекин Ноктюрн Забвения поведал Вольному Торговцу о плененных провидцах эльдаров с утерянного мира-корабля Крудараха, заточенных в шпиле кабала Опустошительной бури. Узнав о несчастье, настигшем собратьев, Ирлиэт просит Лорд-капитана о помощи — спасти уцелевших провидцев, дабы узнать, наконец, правду об исчезновении ее родного мира.

traits.locale_text: Арлекин Занни поведал Вольному Торговцу о плененных провидцах эльдар с утерянного мира-корабля Крудараха, заточенных в Шпиле кабала Опустошительной Бури. Узнав о несчатье, настигшем собратьев, Ирлиэт просит Лорд-капитана о помощи — спасти уцелевших провидцев, дабы узнать, наконец, правду об исчезновении ее родного мира.

languages.text: The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach, who are being held in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.
languages.original_text: Арлекин Ноктюрн Забвения поведал Вольному Торговцу о плененных провидцах эльдаров с утерянного мира-корабля Крудараха, заточенных в шпиле кабала Опустошительной бури. Узнав о несчастье, настигшем собратьев, Ирлиэт просит Лорд-капитана о помощи — спасти уцелевших провидцев, дабы узнать, наконец, правду об исчезновении ее родного мира.

traits.locale_text: The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach being held in the Reaving Tempest spire. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach, who are being held in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

languages.text: L'Arlequin qui se fait appeler le Nocturne de l'Oubli a parlé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} des Grands Prophètes aeldaris qui ont été capturés à bord du vaisseau-monde perdu de Crudarach. Ceux-ci sont retenus prisonniers dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse. En apprenant le triste sort de ses semblables, Yrliet a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de l'aider à sauver les Grands Prophètes survivants pour découvrir la vérité quant à la disparition de son vaisseau-monde.
languages.original_text: The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach, who are being held in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

traits.locale_text: L'arlequin qui se fait appeler le Nocturne de l'Oubli a parlé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} des Grands Prophètes aeldaris qui ont été capturés à bord du vaisseau-monde perdu de Crudarach. Ceux-ci sont retenus prisonniers dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse. En apprenant le triste sort de ses semblables, Yrliet a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de l'aider à sauver les Grands Prophètes survivants pour découvrir la vérité quant à la disparition de son vaisseau-monde.

languages.text: 一位名为“遗忘夜曲”的丑角，告诉了行商浪人那些艾达灵族先知的下落。那些先知都是黑暗灵族从方舟世界克鲁达拉赫抓来的，目前被关押在狂风阴谋团的尖塔里。伊莉耶特得知了族人的不幸遭遇之后，请求行商浪人拯救那些幸存的先知，揭开她的故乡神秘消失的真相。
languages.original_text: The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach, who are being held in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

traits.locale_text: 一位名为“遗忘夜曲”的丑角，告诉了行商浪人那些艾达灵族先知的下落。那些先知都是黑暗灵族从方舟世界克鲁达拉赫抓来的，目前被关押在狂风阴谋团的尖塔里。伊莉耶特得知了族人的不幸遭遇之后，请求行商浪人拯救那些幸存的先知，揭开她的故乡神秘消失的真相。

languages.text: 忘却のノクターンという名のハーレクィンが自由開拓者に語った。略奪の嵐の尖塔に捕らえられている、クルダラの失われた方舟からやって来たアエルダリの先見司のことを。同族の不幸を知ったユリエットは、方舟消滅の真相を解明すべく、生き残った先見司たちを救出する手助けをしてくれるようロード・キャプテンに頼み込んだ。
languages.original_text: The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach, who are being held in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

traits.locale_text: 忘却のノクターンという名のハーレクィンが自由開拓者に語った。略奪の嵐の尖塔に捕らえられている、クルダラの失われた方舟からやって来たアエルダリの先見司のことを。同族の不幸を知ったユリエットは、方舟消滅の真相を解明すべく、生き残った先見司たちを救出する手助けをしてくれるようロード・キャプテンに頼み込んだ。

languages.text: Der Harlekin namens Nocturne des Nichts hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von den Aeldari-Runenpropheten berichtet, die von dem verlorenen Weltenschiff Crudarach verschleppt wurden. Sie werden im Turm des plündernden Sturms festgehalten. Als Yrliet vom Schicksal ihrer Verwandten erfahren hat, hat sie den Lord Captain gebeten, die überlebenden Runenpropheten zu befreien. Sie hofft, dadurch die Wahrheit über das Verschwinden ihres Weltenschiffs in Erfahrung zu bringen.
languages.original_text: The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach, who are being held in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

traits.locale_text: Der Harlekin namens Nocturne des Nichts hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von den Aeldari-Runenpropheten berichtet, die von dem verlorenen Weltenschiff Crudarach verschleppt wurden. Sie werden im Turm des plündernden Sturms festgehalten. Als Yrliet vom Schicksal ihrer Verwandten erfahren hat, hat sie den Lord Captain gebeten, die überlebenden Runenpropheten zu befreien. Sie hofft, dadurch die Wahrheit über das Verschwinden ihres Weltenschiffs in Erfahrung zu bringen.

languages.text: El Arlequín conocido como Nocturno del Olvido ha informado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente sobre los videntes Aeldari capturados del mundo astronave perdido de Crudarach. Están cautivos en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. Al descubrir el paradero de su gente, Yrliet ruega a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que la ayude a rescatar a los videntes supervivientes para descubrir la verdad sobre la desaparición de su mundo astronave.
languages.original_text: The Harlequin named Nocturne of Oblivion has told the Rogue Trader about the captured Aeldari Farseers from the lost craftworld of Crudarach, who are being held in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. Upon learning about her kin's misfortune, Yrliet asked the Lord Captain to help her rescue the surviving Farseers to learn the truth about the disappearance of her craftworld.

Están cautivos en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. Al descubrir el paradero de su gente, Yrliet ruega a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que la ayude a rescatar a los videntes supervivientes para descubrir la verdad sobre la desaparición de su mundo astronave.

languages.text: Nisyan Noktürnü adındaki Arleken, Hür Tacir'e Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'nde tutulan ve kayıp gemidünya Crudarach'tan gelen mahkûm Aeldari Ötesezenler hakkında bilgi verdi. Yrliet, soydaşlarının yaşadığı badireleri duyunca gemidünyasının ortadan kayboluşu hakkındaki gerçeği öğrenmek için Lord Kaptan'dan hayatta kalan Ötesezenleri kurtarmasına yardımcı olmasını istedi.
